text: In this issue of Arthritis Care & Research, the authors of Patient-Perception of Disease-Related Symptoms and Complications in Relapsing Polychondritis report for the first time the patient's view over the disease (1). Thanks go to them for this important step forward. The method used however, carries some limitations, as indicated very honestly by the authors. This article is protected by copyright.
